name: Rescue Hero: Pull the Pin
description:
The hero begins his journey for treasure and save princess, but the puzzles in front of the hunter trapped him. What you need to do is to pull the pins in the right order, so that the hero can take the hidden treasure and save princess away from dragon, wolf and monster safely.

Solve puzzles and rescue hero collect all the treasures, kill monster and save princess. Pull the pin and destroy your enemies by pulling lava and poisonous gas into their puzzle units. Cut the ropes in order to rescue the princess from the scary monster.

FEATURE:
- Free to play, play it anywhere anytime
- Suitable for all ages
- Graphic, visual, music & sounds are outstanding
- Use your brain to solve the puzzles
- No time & live limited, enjoy yourself
- Collect gold and build your own kingdom

Get money and build your kingdom or buy more hero skin. Help the hero rescue the princess now.
